survey_brief: This survey aims to gather student and faculty feedback on current sustainability initiatives at the university, identifying areas for improvement and potential new programs.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of the university's current sustainability programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for awareness levels. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for radio buttons.

script.question_text: How aware are you of the university's current sustainability programs?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Include 'None of the above' to capture non-participation.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes, at least one selection required.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the university's efforts to promote sustainability?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Randomize order if possible to reduce bias.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the university's efforts to promote sustainability?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented on campus?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented on campus?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in joining a student-led sustainability committee?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge willingness for involvement. Include neutral option.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in joining a student-led sustainability committee?
